name: VirtualBus Vehicle Configuration File
summary: Learn about .BS1 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: BS1 files are saved in a plain text format and can be edited to create custom buses. However, customization requires in-depth knowledge and typically is only performed by advanced users.

description: Game file used by VirtualBus, a free bus driving simulation game; contains configuration parameters for the 3D bus driven by the player; stores settings such as the vehicle colors, tire specifications, and the models used by each bus segment.
